disciplined.bulletText: Disciplined||This unit does not suffer a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]morale penalty when the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Hero dies. It can also rally after routing more often.
disciplined.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/disciplined.png]][[/img]]训练有素
disciplined.description: 训练有素||这支部队的[[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]士气不会受到[[img:icon_general]][[/img]]英雄阵亡的影响，在被击溃后也能更快地重整。

causes_terror.bulletText: Causes Terror||This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
causes_terror.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/causes_terror.png]][[/img]]惊骇敌军
causes_terror.description: 惊骇敌军||这支部队可以引发惊骇状态，令其近战目标在短时间内溃走。触发惊骇状态的部队同时可以免疫恐惧与惊骇效果

immortal.bulletText: Immortal||This unit cannot have less than 1 hitpoint for the duration of the ability.
immortal.name: 不朽
immortal.description: 不朽||能力持续期间，该部队生命值不会少于1。

construct.bulletText: Construct||This unit is an animated construct (does not rout, is immune to terror, becomes unstable when [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]{{tr:morale}} is low). Necrotects can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.
construct.description: 构装体||这支部队是活化构装体（不会溃逃，免疫惊骇，会在[[img:icon_士气]][[/img]]morale低落时进入不稳定状态）。古墓技师可以令其发挥出全部的战斗潜力，并在战斗中修复它

resist_heat.bulletText: Resistant to Heat||This unit tires less quickly in the desert.
resist_heat.name: 炎热抗性
resist_heat.description: 耐热||于沙漠上战斗时，这支部队受到的疲劳影响会减慢

mounted_fire_move.bulletText: Fire While Moving||This unit can fire while on the move with a mount.
mounted_fire_move.name: 移动射击
mounted_fire_move.description: 移动射击||这支部队可以在坐骑上进行移动射击。

rear_shield_enabled.bulletText: Unit has enabled rear shield defense
rear_shield_enabled.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/fx_icon_rear_shield_defense.png]][[/img]]后方盾防

causes_fear.bulletText: Causes Fear||This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]morale when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
causes_fear.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/causes_fear.png]][[/img]]引发恐惧
causes_fear.description: 引发恐惧||这支部队可以散播恐惧，令附近敌方部队遭受[[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]士气惩罚。同时这支部队自身也可以免疫恐惧。恐惧效果无法叠加。

stalk.bulletText: Stalk||This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
stalk.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/stalk.png]][[/img]]潜行
stalk.description: 潜行||这支部队在任何地形上移动时都会保持隐蔽。

hide_building.bulletText: Hide (buildings)||This unit can hide in buildings until enemy units get too close. - NOT WH
hide_building.name: 隐蔽（建筑）
hide_building.description: 于建筑中隐蔽||这支部队可以隐蔽在建筑里，除非敌人走到近前，否则他们不会被发现. - NOT WH

unbreakable.bulletText: Unbreakable||This unit does not suffer any form of [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]morale loss and will never rout.
unbreakable.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/unbreakable.png]][[/img]]死战不退
unbreakable.description: 死战不退||这支部队不会承受任何形式的[[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]士气惩罚，并且永远不会溃散。

run_amok.bulletText: Spartoi Rampage||This unit can go on a rampage, attacking anything in their sight.
run_amok.name: [[col:red]][[img:icon_arrow_down]][[/img]]狂怒暴走！[[/col]]
run_amok.description: 地生人狂暴||该部队可能会陷入狂暴，攻击视线内的任何目标。

piercing_attack.name: 神射手
piercing_attack.description: 神射手||该部队的远程攻击将无视任何盾牌格挡率。

flanking_immune.bulletText: Immune to Flanking||Removes all bonuses from the attacker for attacking this unit from the sides or from behind
flanking_immune.name: 免疫包抄
flanking_immune.description: 免疫包抄||移除敌军从侧后方攻击这支部队时的所有加成效果。

guerrilla_deploy.name: 先锋部署||这支部队可以在部署区域外进行部署
guerrilla_deploy.description: 先锋部署||这支部队可以在部署区域外进行部署

resist_cold.bulletText: Resistant to Cold||This unit tires less quickly in snow.
resist_cold.name: 寒冷抗性
resist_cold.description: 耐寒||于雪地上战斗时，这支部队受到的疲劳影响会减慢

scare_immune.bulletText: Immune to Fear||This unit is immune to the fear effects of scary units.
scare_immune.name: 免疫恐惧
scare_immune.description: 免疫恐惧||这支部队免疫某些特殊部队的恐惧打击效果

impetuous.bulletText: Impetuous||This unit gets an extra [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus when eager. - NOT WH
impetuous.name: 嗜血好战
impetuous.description: 嗜血好战||当战意高昂时，这支部队会获得额外的[[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]领导力加成

fatigue_immune.bulletText: Perfect Vigour||Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses stamina.
fatigue_immune.name: 精力充沛
fatigue_immune.description: 精力充沛||即便是进行最为劳累的行动，这支部队也绝不会力竭。

expendable.bulletText: Expendable||Witnessing friendly expendable units rout does not reduce other units' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]morale, unless they are themselves expendable.
expendable.name: 炮灰
expendable.description: 炮灰||目睹友军炮灰部队溃败并不会影响其他部队的[[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]士气，除非他们也是炮灰。

flanking_defence_improved.bulletText: Flanking Defence Improved||Reduces the bonus effects of the attacker when this unit is being attacked from the sides or from behind.
flanking_defence_improved.name: 包抄防御
flanking_defence_improved.description: 包抄防御||降低敌军从侧后方攻击这支部队时的加成效果。

flanking_attack_improved.bulletText: Flanking Attack Improved||Increases the bonus effects when this unit is attacking another unit from the sides or from behind.
flanking_attack_improved.name: 包抄强化
flanking_attack_improved.description: 包抄强化||增加这支部队从侧后方攻击敌军时的加成效果。

unspottable.bulletText: Unspottable||If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.
unspottable.imuedEffectText: Spotted only at very close range
unspottable.name: 仅能在距离相当近时被发现
unspottable.description: 隐蔽高手||若这支部队可在当前位置隐蔽，则敌人只有在距离十分接近时才能发现他们。

uncontrollable.bulletText: [PH] Uncontrollable||The unit becomes uncontrollable - do not accept any command

ignore_ground_move_mod.bulletText: Ignore Ground Type||Speed penalties caused by the terrain are ignored by this unit. - NOT WH
ignore_ground_move_mod.name: 无视地形
ignore_ground_move_mod.description: 无视地形||这支部队免受因地形带来的速度惩罚- NOT WH

mounted_fire_parthian.bulletText: Horseback Sharpshooting||This unit can fire all around and not just in-front of itself.
mounted_fire_parthian.name: 帕提亚箭术
mounted_fire_parthian.description: 弓马娴熟||这支部队可向四面八方射击，并不局限于自己的前方。

immune_to_psychology.bulletText: Immune to Psychology||The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
immune_to_psychology.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/immune_to_psychology.png]][[/img]]心理免疫
immune_to_psychology.description: 心理免疫||这支部队免疫心理攻击（恐惧与惊骇）。

definite_berserk.bulletText: Berserk||This unit will go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, they will automatically attack nearby enemies.
definite_berserk.name: 狂暴
definite_berserk.description: 狂暴||该部队在战斗时会陷入狂暴。狂暴的部队无法控制，并会自动攻击周围的敌人。

hide_forest.bulletText: Hide (forest)||This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
hide_forest.name: 隐蔽（树林）
hide_forest.description: 隐蔽（树林）||这支部队能够在树林中保持隐蔽，除非敌军过于接近。

scare_horse.bulletText: Scare (horses)||This unit gives a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty to enemy horses. - NOT WH
scare_horse.name: 惊吓马匹
scare_horse.description: 惊吓马匹||这支部队可以严重打击敌方骑马部队的[[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]领导力 - NOT WH

hide_grass.bulletText: Hide (grass)||This unit can hide in long grass until enemy units get too close.
hide_grass.name: 隐蔽（草丛）
hide_grass.description: 隐蔽（草地）||这支部队能够在草丛中保持隐蔽，除非敌军过于接近。

ignore_forest_penalties.bulletText: Strider||Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
ignore_forest_penalties.name: 地形适性
ignore_forest_penalties.description: 地形适性||这支部队不会受到因地形导致的速度与战斗惩罚。

campaign_stealth.bulletText: Campaign Stealth||This unit can move around the campaign map without being seen.
campaign_stealth.name: 战略地图匿踪
campaign_stealth.description: 战略地图匿踪||这支部队可以在战略地图上匿踪，无法被敌人发现

field_bandaging.bulletText: Battlefield Healing||When outside of combat, this unit replenishes hit points over time.
field_bandaging.name: 战地急救
field_bandaging.description: 战地急救||在脱离战斗时，这支部队会随时间补充生命值。

berserk.bulletText: Berserk||This unit can go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, they will automatically attack nearby enemies. - NOT WH
berserk.name: 狂暴
berserk.description: 狂暴||这支部队可以在战斗中狂暴化。狂暴的部队无法控制，他们会自动攻击周围的敌人. - NOT WH

encourages.bulletText: Encourage||This unit provides a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]morale bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Hero's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
encourages.name: 激励友军
encourages.description: 激励友军||这支部队可以提振周围友军的[[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]士气。当友军同时位于拥有此特性的部队与[[img:icon_general]][[/img]]英雄的影响范围内时，其增益效果取此二者的最大值。

hide_scrub_and_forest.bulletText: Hide (scrub & forest)||This unit can hide in tall grass, scrub and forest until enemy units get too close.
hide_scrub_and_forest.name: 隐蔽（高草丛、灌木与树林）
hide_scrub_and_forest.description: 隐蔽（灌木与树林）||这支部队能够在高草丛、灌木与树林中保持隐蔽，除非敌军过于接近。

mighty_knockback.bulletText: Mighty Knockback||This unit causes extra damage when it knocks enemies back. - NOT WH
mighty_knockback.name: 强力击退
mighty_knockback.description: 全力击退||当攻击敌军时，这支部队可以将敌人击退，并对敌人造成额外伤害. - NOT WH

cant_run.bulletText: Cannot Run||This unit cannot run and will only move at walking pace.
cant_run.name: 无法奔跑
cant_run.description: 徐行||这支部队无法奔跑，只能用行走的方式在战场上移动

fire_while_moving.bulletText: Shoot While Moving||This unit can fire while on the move.
fire_while_moving.name: 移动射击
fire_while_moving.description: 移动射击||这支部队可以在移动的同时进行射击。

all_ranks_fire.bulletText: All Ranks Fire||All ranks can fire if using a weapon that only allows 1 rank to do so. - NOT WH
all_ranks_fire.name: 全员射击
all_ranks_fire.description: 全员射击||当使用平直弹道武器时，这支部队的所有人都能同时射击. - NOT WH

snipe.bulletText: Snipe||This unit remains hidden while firing.
snipe.name: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/snipe.png]][[/img]]狙击
snipe.description: 狙击||这支部队会在射击时保持隐蔽。

charge_reflector.bulletText: Expert Charge Defence||When bracing, this unit negates the [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus of any attacker.
charge_reflector.name: 抵御冲锋
charge_reflector.description: 抵御冲锋||这支部队在对抗敌军冲锋时会无视其所有的[[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]冲锋加成

rampage.bulletText: Rampage||When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.
rampage.name: [[col:red]][[img:icon_arrow_down]][[/img]]狂怒暴走！[[/col]]
rampage.description: 癫狂||当这支部队受到伤害时，它可能会陷入癫狂状态，从而自动攻击距离自己最近的敌军，而忽视其它任何命令

charge_reflector_vs_large.bulletText: Charge Defence vs. Large||When bracing, this unit negates the [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus of any large attacker.
charge_reflector_vs_large.name: 对抗大型冲锋
charge_reflector_vs_large.description: 抵御大型部队冲锋||这支部队在对抗大型部队冲锋时会无视其所有的[[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]冲锋加成

formed_attack.bulletText: Formation Attack||The unit will try to stay in formation when in melee. - NOT WH
formed_attack.name: 保持阵型
formed_attack.description: 保持阵型||当进行近战时，这支部队会尽量保持阵型. - NOT WH

fatigue_res.bulletText: Strong Vigour||This unit's stamina is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.
fatigue_res.name: 精力旺盛
fatigue_res.description: 精力充沛||这支部队的耐力更佳，不易在战斗中疲惫。
